data.title: Oracle Business Applications
data.text:
Oracle Business Applications are available weekdays from 12:00 am until 7:00 pm and available all weekend. On some weekday nights, they may become available earlier than 12:00 a.m., dependent on the nightly schedule finish time. On a month-end close day, the applications will be available from 12:00am until 6:00 pm. Note: If the month-end close happens on a Friday and the first of the month has not occurred yet, the oracle application will be unavailable until the first day of the month. Exceptions to these times will be noted in red above.

Oracle Business Applications Production

To access the Oracle Business Applications, you will need to log in with a username and password.

Access Oracle Production Application go here

Change/Forgot Password go here

***Training/Sandbox has been moved to the links below.***
